text: 4.9 Lom 8.3, 1 Ko 8.3, Kol 2.20, Hib 7.18 Pen mɨñɨl God nop gos nɨgtep gɨpɨm. Nɨbi pen nop nɨŋɨd ma dɨpek, ne ke nɨbop nɨŋɨd dak. Anɨb ak tek, taynen nɨbi takaw Mosis ñu kɨl tɨkak ak nɨŋɨd, wog gɨñeb ne okok tek mɨdebɨm? Bɨlel chɨp day, kɨcheki, tap anɨb okok kɨdek gelɨgɨpɨm tek, mɨñɨl adɨkɨd apɨl kɨdek gebɨm. Takaw Mosis ñu kɨl tɨkak ak ayɨp chɨp kɨcheki walɨjpal anɨb okok ayɨp, kɨli kɨles ma mɨdebal.
